name: Fruit Pirate Ninja - VR Game - Oculus Quest
name_original: Fruit Pirate Ninja - VR Game - Oculus Quest
description:
This was a demo game created for Oculus Quest 2 using Unity and the Oculus Integration.

I also used the  Ezy Slice( https://github.com/DavidArayan/ezy-slice/blob/master/README.md) to slash the fruits properly.

In this game you are a pirate practicing your sword skills to cut as many fruits as you can. 

The cannons follow a wave system and it gets harder every 20 seconds, making more fruits spawn and the shooting rate increase.
